dct_title_s: Outline of the geology of the globe, 1853.
dct_description_sm: Detached from: Outline of the geology of the globe, and of the United States in particular : with two geological maps, and sketches of characteristic American fossils / by Edward Hitchcock. [1853 or 1854].  "W.C. Sharp's Lith. Boston."  Includes inset of "Supposed Antarctic Continent" and two mountain profiles.
